actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration, H. Rept. 95-136.
Measure called up as privileged matter in House.

official_title: Resolution to provide for the administrative expenses incurred in concluding the business and activities of the former Select Committee on Professional Sports.

summary.text: Declares that certain administrative expenses of the former House Select Committee on Professional Sports, not to exceed $3,000, shall be paid out of the contingent fund of the House. Terminates such authorization on March 31, 1977.

titles.title: Resolution to provide for the administrative expenses incurred in concluding the business and activities of the former Select Committee on Professional Sports.
